Articles.Content:
I'm currently in the process of redoing my space fleet and though the Meteor was one of my newer ships it looked pretty poor. I've rebuilt the wings and nose and boosted the dV to 2.4km/s.

I used the X-wing as inspiration here and the Meteor is deigned to fill the same role as a long ranged fighter capable of acting away from carrier support. I've opted for a pair of aerospikes as my standard fighter engines due to their mix of high power, reasonable efficiency and compact size. I've removed the weaponry to people can either arm it themselves or simply use it for civilian tasks and cruise around the system in style and it can even be used to land on smaller planetary bodies due to the rear mounted landing legs.

Stats

Length: 11m

(Rest coming soon)

Craft: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ctuyxyxry9pv4ae/SF-23E%20Meteor.craft
